ing: 1 splash club soda, or as needed
des: "The gin lover's sangria. A deconstructed Pimm's if you will. Subtly sweet and fruity, and oh so refreshing! Garnish with cucumber lime and mint."
ins: Combine cucumber, mint, sugar, and orange bitters in a highball glass; muddle until fragrant. Fill glass with frozen fruit and top with gin, lime juice, and red wine. Top with club soda and stir.
